issue.title: www.decentsamples.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.decentsamples.com/product/decent-sampler-plugin/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.decentsamples.com%2Fproduct%2Fdecent-sampler-plugin%2F) ### Comment > Adguard won't stop loading. issue.title: https://www.tekfullfilmizle5.com and https://dizimag.eu/ cant play video without click ads twice
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version Version 5.2.500.10 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.tekfullfilmizle5.com, and https://dizimag.eu/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. 2. comment.body:
@odis2277 @Alex-302 

For first issue

`dizimag.eu###birinci`
`dizimag.eu###ikinci:style(display: block !important)`

But the video takes a little while to load, about 6-7 seconds.
